Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() ' can be used on any Item Type - Server Side . OnBeforeAdd ' there is also another client side method for this . ' (which will set the value first so server side method will not override user's settings
' will Set the owned_by_id To the current user's id (creator), if not set already Dim owner As String = Me.getProperty("owned_by_id","")
If (owner = "") Then Dim aliasId = Me.getInnovator().getUserAliases() If (aliasId <> "") Then aliasId = aliasId.Substring(0,32) Dim AliasItem = Me.getInnovator().getItemById("Identity", aliasId) If (AliasItem.getItemCount() =1) Then Me.setProperty("owned_by_id", AliasItem.getAttribute("id")) Me.setPropertyAttribute("owned_by_id", "keyed_name", AliasItem.getProperty("keyed_name", "")) End If End If End If Return Me
Item.name: Set currUser as Owner - OnAdd
